title.narrative: Voluntary contributions to the OECD's Development Assistance Committee (DAC) in 2017 & 2018 to assist the Committee in delivering their work plan, agreed by all Members including the UK, in support of sustainable, effective development.

description.narrative: This activity (Voluntary contributions to the OECD's Development Assistance Committee (DAC) in 2017 & 2018 to assist the Committee in delivering their work plan, agreed by all Members including the UK, in support of sustainable, effective development.) is a component of FCDO voluntary contributions to the DAC 2017 and 2018 and DAC Secondment reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £735,000. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD). The start date is 01-01-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2020.
